Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit a clutch home run in the eighth inning to power the Yankees to a 3-2 win over the Royals in Game 3 of the AL Division Series
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees will turn to ace Gerrit Cole on Thursday night, who will have the opportunity to pitch the Yankees into the American League Championship Series
Post-Match Reflections: The Yankees' bullpen played a crucial role in their 3-2 victory over the Royals in Game 3 of the AL Division Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked a historic occasion, as it was the first postseason contest at Kauffman Stadium in over 3,000 days
Others: The Royals' defensive prowess was showcased by Bobby Witt Jr.'s catch of Aaron Judge's powerful line drive
